tool_description: The LinkedIn Profile Data API provides access to various LinkedIn profile data, including the profile connection count, whether the user is open to work, and if they are hiring, all returned in a JSON format.

api_list.name: Get profile data
api_list.description: Retrieves the LinkedIn profile data for a specified user.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: The LinkedIn username of the profile to retrieve.

api_list.name: Get profile data & connection count
api_list.description: Retrieves both the LinkedIn profile data and the connection count for a specified user.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: The LinkedIn username of the profile to retrieve.

api_list.name: Get profile connection count
api_list.description: Retrieves the connection count for a specified LinkedIn profile.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: The LinkedIn username of the profile to retrieve the connection count for.
